649550.name: Three Twenty One - Extra Content
649550.description:
The Three Twenty One soundtrack by David J. Franco provided as high quality MP3 files.

Track Listing

1 A Last Thought
2 Cluster Damage
3 Leave The Way You Came
4 Loom And Linger
5 Minigame Thema 1
6 Minigame Theme 2
7 Minigame Theme 3
8 Minigame Theme 4
9 Minigame Theme 5
10 Minigame Theme 6
11 The Ascent
12 The Ascent Ending
13 The Block Horse
14 The Last 3 Minutes And 21 Seconds
15 Viking Tale
16 Void Remix
17 Void Theme

Extra Content

- Play the standalone teaser we showcased at Eurogamer/Rezzed 2016 (Windows only!)
- Ingame audio commentary by David who gives you some information about the design of our game areas


This DLC directly supports our charity work. Read more in our Community Hub!
649550.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
